mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM AS RNO, AD_NO, AD_TITLE, C_NICKNAME, CASE WHEN AD_CHOOSESTATUS = 'N' THEN '채택대기' ELSE '채택완료' END AS "AD_CHOOSESTATUS", HPCATE_NAME FROM (SELECT A.AD_NO, A.AD_TITLE, C.C_NICKNAME, A.AD_CHOOSESTATUS, H.HPCATE_NAME FROM ASKDR A JOIN CLIENT C ON A.C_NO = C.C_NO JOIN HPCATEGORY H ON A.HP_CATE_CODE = H.HPCATE_CODE ORDER BY A.AD_SUBMITDATE DESC)

SELECT A.AD_NO, A.AD_TITLE, A.AD_SUBMITDATE, A.AD_HEIGHT, A.AD_WEIGHT, A.AD_AGE, A.AD_GENDER, A.AD_CAUTION, A.AD_SYMPTOM, A.AD_COUNT, C.C_NICKNAME, H.HPCATE_NAME, CASE WHEN A.AD_CHOOSESTATUS = 'N' THEN '채택대기' ELSE '채택완료' END AS "AD_CHOOSESTATUS", R.ADR_NO, D.DR_NAME, R.ADR_REPLYDATE, R.ADR_CONTENT, CASE WHEN R.ADR_CHOOSESTATUS = 'N' THEN '미채택' ELSE '채택' END AS "ADR_CHOOSESTATUS", P.ADP_NO, P.ADP_RENAME FROM ASKDR A JOIN HPCATEGORY H ON A.HP_CATE_CODE = H.HPCATE_CODE JOIN CLIENT C ON A.C_NO = C.C_NO LEFT JOIN ASKDRREPLY R ON A.AD_NO = R.AD_NO LEFT JOIN DRCLIENT D ON R.DR_NO = D.DR_NO LEFT JOIN ASKDRPHOTO P ON A.AD_NO = P.AD_NO WHERE A.AD_NO = #{adNo} ORDER BY R.ADR_NO

SELECT ADR_NO, DR_NAME, ADR_CONTENT, ADR_REPLYDATE, CASE WHEN ADR_CHOOSESTATUS = 'N' THEN '미채택' ELSE '채택' END AS "ADR_CHOOSESTATUS" FROM ASKDRREPLY R JOIN DRCLIENT D ON R.DR_NO = D.DR_NO WHERE R.AD_NO = #{adNo}
